name: midland
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
from or relating to the Midlands (= the central part of England): He's got a real Midland accent. There was snow in midland counties of England. See
the Midlands
More examplesFewer examplesA man with a southern or midland English accent intervened. Coventry's midland rivals have now lost their last four league starts. Several new stations are under construction, including one on the Midland main line.
